plays.text: Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Interference Patrik Elias
Goal scored by Bret Hedican assisted by Kevyn Adams and Martin Gelinas
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by Jay Pandolfo
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Slashing Jeff O'Neill
Penalty to Bates Battaglia 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Stevens
Penalty to Bret Hedican 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Brylin
Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Brian Rafalski and Patrik Elias
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Patrik Elias and Brian Rafalski
Goal scored by Erik Cole assisted by Bates Battaglia and David Tanabe
Penalty to VALERI KAMENSKY 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping David Tanabe
Penalty to Sami Kapanen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Sergei Brylin
Goal scored by Aaron Ward assisted by Erik Cole
